Home   Menu

This is hidden text to describe the page. This page has 4 main sections:
the weekly specials menu, breakfast, lunch and beverages.
Each section has a half-inch border or background of camo coloring in a watermark style.
Each section has one or more tables containing items, descriptions and prices.
Weekly specials are listed by day in the first section.
The breakfast section is next and contains a "breakfast tacos" table
and a "breakfast meals and individual items" table.
Next is the lunch section broken into three tables:
burgers, sandwiches and other lunch items.
The last section is for beverages.
Following are hidden links to the sections on this page:

Prices do not include tax.
Large orders must be called in.
